title: Bloomberg Markets: Cambridge Boosts Exposure to Event Funds
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cambridge Boosts Exposure to Event Funds
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hema Parmar Hedge Fund Reporter Bloomberg Brief Discussing Hedge fund consultant Cambridge Associates boosting its clients’ exposure to event-driven hedge funds, citing increased corporate activity amid rising interest rates and regulatory uncertainty.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
